text: Zisas mbe nzambareŋ mbararagiap, khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Rɨɨi fhuv gumgi, mbe thaŋ suaŋv rɨɨi phenan ŋgari guman han ŋgɨrie? Rɨɨi gumgi, mbe nduarira rɨɨi phenan ŋgari guman han vui. Gu gumgi vhuuiŋ ga nzua zɨgi fhuvara. Gu khaŋ muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui gumgir kamɨn za zɨgi.” Zisas Rivair kamgi. (2.14)
